name: FindLove
description:
[[ PLAY IN FULLSCREEN IF THERE'S RESOLUTION PROBLEM ]]

CONTROLS : 

A / D : move

Left mouse button : shoot

R : restart

Z :  interact

P : pause

What is love to you?

The curiosity of this little wizard drags him to accept the invitation by this unknown girl to a mysterious tower which used to be called " Love Tower " without actually knowing what will he go through.

Will you survive in it and understand what is love or fall in despair of loneliness.

Follow the journey with this little wizard !

[SPOILER ALERT]

there's 5 different endings. Have fun !
